fuchsia-virtual-inheritance.description:
Description

Warns if classes are defined with virtual inheritance.

For example, classes should not be defined with virtual inheritance:

class
B
:
public
virtual
A
{};
// warning

See the features disallowed in Fuchsia at
https://fuchsia.dev/fuchsia-src/development/languages/c-cpp/cxx?hl=en
fuchsia-virtual-inheritance.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
